title: The Only Enemy
desc:
Post 2218
*"1, 2, 3, Would you agree that you're the only enemy?"*
- If you do not have an **Obsession**, choose a player. You become **Obsessed** with them.
<:outsiders:1108173904062722118> **__While this is active,__** <:outsiders:1108173904062722118>
- This is destroyed if your **Obsession** doesn't play a card that effects you for 3 turns in a row; the timer resets if they give you attention.
- If your **Obsession** would win the game, you and your **Obsession** both draw or discard until you have 2 cards, then it is your turn, and this card is destroyed.
- Your **Obsession** cannot change.
- Anyone who plays a card against your **Obsession** draws a card.
